tool.name: Gene List to EuPathDB
tool.description: Export a gene list to EuPathDB
tool.help:
**What it does**
This tool obtains a gene list and from that, creates a valid EuPathDB dataset that may be exported to one or more EuPathDB project.
You need to provide a name for the dataset so that you may easily identify it in EuPathDB websites, along with a description and a summary and of course, a gene list. All inputs are required. -----
